Title: Relates to special proceedings by tenants for judgment directing repairs of conditions and other relief in residential real property
Summary: Authorizes special proceedings by tenants for judgment directing repairs of conditions and other relief in residential real property constituting a violation of local or state housing standards and codes; creates a process by which a tenant may start such proceedings in the court clerk's office; grants jurisdiction to city, district and justice courts; provides remedies; makes related provisions.
LawSection: Real Property Actions and Proceedings Law
LawCode: Add Art 7-C §§797 - 797-j, RPAP L; amd §204, UCCA; amd §204, UDCA; amd §204, UJCA
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property actions and proceedings law, in relation to special proceedings by tenants for judgment directing repairs of conditions and other relief in residential real property; and to amend the uniform city court act, the uniform district court act, and the uniform justice act, in relation to summary proceedings relating thereto
